languages.text: {n}Молодой человек немного грустнеет, но тотчас очень учтиво кланяется.{/n} "Как угодно Вашей Светлости. Не извольте гневаться — немедленно всех отпущу!"
{n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"
languages.original_text: {n}Молодой человек немного грустнеет, но тотчас очень учтиво кланяется.{/n} "Как угодно Вашей Светлости. Не извольте гневаться — немедленно всех отпущу!"

traits.locale_text: {n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"
{n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"
{n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"
{n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"
{n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"

languages.text: {n}男の明るさが少し消えたが、即座に丁寧に頭を下げた。{/n}「陛下の仰せのままに。ご安心ください―すぐに彼らを解放しましょう！」
languages.original_text: {n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"

traits.locale_text: {n}男の明るさが少し消えたが、即座に丁寧に頭を下げた。{/n}「陛下の仰せのままに。ご安心ください―すぐに彼らを解放しましょう！」

languages.text: {n}男人脸上的得意之色微微消退，但他立即恭敬地向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“如您所愿，大人。不用担心，我这就把他们都放了！”
languages.original_text: {n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"

traits.locale_text: {n}男人脸上的得意之色微微消退，但他立即恭敬地向你鞠了一躬。{/n}“如您所愿，大人。不用担心，我这就把他们都放了！”

languages.text: {n}La alegría del hombre se desvanece un poco, pero al instante te ofrece una reverencia respetuosa.{/n} «A sus órdenes, {mf|milord|milady}. No se preocupe; ¡los liberaré a todos enseguida!».
languages.original_text: {n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"

traits.locale_text: {n}La alegría del hombre se desvanece un poco, pero al instante te ofrece una reverencia respetuosa.{/n} «A sus órdenes, {mf|milord|milady}. No se preocupe; ¡los liberaré a todos enseguida!».

languages.text: {n}Le sourire de l'homme semble se crisper et il se courbe dans une révérence.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie ! N'ayez crainte, je vais tous les libérer de ce pas. »
languages.original_text: {n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Le sourire de l'homme semble se crisper et il se courbe dans une révérence.{/n} « Comme il vous plaira, Votre Seigneurie ! N'ayez crainte, je vais tous les libérer de ce pas. »

languages.text: {n}Die Freundlichkeit des Mannes lässt ein wenig nach, aber er verbeugt sich umgehend respektvoll vor dir.{/n} "Wie Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wünschen. Kein Grund zur Sorge – ich werde sie alle sofort freilassen!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Die Freundlichkeit des Mannes lässt ein wenig nach, aber er verbeugt sich umgehend respektvoll vor dir.{/n} "Wie Eure {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} wünschen. Kein Grund zur Sorge – ich werde sie alle sofort freilassen!"

languages.text: {n}Adamın neşesi biraz sönse de anında saygıyla önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri nasıl dilerlerse. Endişe etmeyin, derhâl salıyorum hepsini!"
languages.original_text: {n}The man's cheerfulness fades a little, but he instantly offers you a respectful bow.{/n} "As Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} wishes. No need to fret — I will release them all immediately!"

traits.locale_text: {n}Adamın neşesi biraz sönüyor ancak anında saygıyla önünde eğiliyor.{/n} "{mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri nasıl dilerlerse. Endişe etmeyin, hepsini derhâl salıvereceğim!"
